message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"very; extremely","sentence":"这个电影非常好看。","image_prompt":"A cozy, soft apocalypse-style animation showing a group of friends in a dimly lit room watching a movie together. Their faces glow with excitement and joy as the screen shines, and the post-apocalyptic outdoors is just visible through a broken window. The room feels both warm and safe. The overall mood is uplifting, with pastel colors and gentle light effects.","sentence_translation":"This movie is very good to watch."}
